name: Elf Crimes
description:
It's cold in the North Pole. Very cold. But it ain't the cold that kills ya, per say.
It's those long lonely nights, the weight of the snow, and what they drive even the littlest elf to do...
Up here, Holly Jolly is the name of that bottle of hooch you keep in the drawer for special occasions, and a nutcracker ballet is something you do to someone who ended up on your own personal Naughty List.

Elf Crimes is a game with the feeling of 40s noir pulp fiction, and the look of a Rankin/Bass holiday special. Dark things happen in twinkle light-lit alleys, and you are all that's left to carry out justice in a world of crooked cops and plutocratic politicians. You got a job to do, and that's the way the cookie crumbles.
